A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After watching TLJ for the first time and being a bit disappointed\, I went back to see it a second time and was much happier and satisfied when the credits rolled. This is definitely a movie that gets better the more times it's viewed\, though there are still some scenes and new characters I don't much care for. After watching some SW theory videos on YouTube\, I'm excited to go see TLJ a third time and really pay attention to the brilliant\, fine details woven throughout the film and be surprised all over again!
